comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Other Bain/LOC photos of the Democratic U. S. Congressmen visiting New Jersey Governor Woodrow Wilson, at the New Jersey resort town of Sea Girt, at the time of Wilson's nomination as the Democratic candidate for President in the election of 1912:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3029431299/in/photostream/]
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2422676781/]
